name: get_dags
description:
List DAGs in the database.
`dag_id_pattern` can be set to match dags of a specific pattern

limit.description: The numbers of items to return.

offset.description: The number of items to skip before starting to collect the result set.

order_by.description:
The name of the field to order the results by.
Prefix a field name with `-` to reverse the sort order.

*New in version 2.1.0*

tags.description:
List of tags to filter results.

*New in version 2.2.0*

only_active.description:
Only filter active DAGs.

*New in version 2.1.1*

dag_id_pattern.description: If set, only return DAGs with dag_ids matching this pattern.

$ul: **total_entries**: Count of total objects in the current result set before pagination parameters
